meanings.sent1: She mismade the cake by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent2: I always fear I will mismake a wrong turn while driving.
meanings.sent3: The robot mismade the bed, putting the pillow where the blanket should be.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to fix the clock only served to mismake it further.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes mismake the beautiful landscape into a chaotic mess.

meanings.sent1: The mismake in the blueprint caused the building to collapse.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the mismake in the recipe after the cake was already in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The mismake in the costume made the character look like a different person.
meanings.sent4: The small mismake in the painting gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The mismake in the design of the car led to a recall by the manufacturer.
